ygData.subject: Re: Necros wanting hymm of restoration
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They have two spells that do this, Dark Pact, a level 12 song, and another one at higher levels, like 20 or 24.  Singing Hymn for a necro using these songs
ygData.messageBody:
"Mott, Mike J." wrote:

> From: "Mott, Mike J." <Mike.J.Mott@...>
>
> :All necros I've ever grouped with want me to play hymn of restoration and
> :they claim it greatly helps their mana regen. All other mana users see no
> :increase in mana regen no matter what song I play. Maybe this is a bug
> that
> :just affects Necros?
>
> Necros have a spell that swaps their hits for mana that acts over time (I
> think they get this at 24), and so they take damage. When I am in a group
> with one playing the Hymm, they dont take the damage :)
>
> Probably the reason they always want you to play it.....
>

They have two spells that do this, Dark Pact, a level 12 song, and another one
at higher levels, like 20 or 24. Singing Hymn for a necro using these songs
would endear them to you greatly.

Jyzan
